channel.title: Tutorials on Yo-kai Watch TKB

item.title: CTRPluginFramework
item.description: CTRPluginFramework (CTRPF) is a framework for programmatically modding 3DS games. While it is mainly intended to be used as a template for developers to make mod menus and such, it has some very useful memory hacking features on its own. CTRPF can run on both real hardware and through emulation. Installation (3DS) Make sure you have the latest Luma3DS Download the .3gx file from the CTRPF releases. Rename the file to default.
